name: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? 2nd UK Edition
name_original: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? 2nd UK Edition
description:
Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? 2nd UK Edition is a family game developed by Hothouse Creations. It was originally released in 2001. Eidos Interactive published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? 2nd UK Edition on PC and PlayStation.
